quota.minorityQuota: 30% of seats are reserved for Christian students
quota.generalQuota: Remaining seats are open to others without distinction of caste, creed, or religion as per Government rules

admissionPolicy.minorityQuotaSeats: 30% of the seats will be filled based on merit in the qualifying examination
admissionPolicy.governmentQuotaSeats: Remaining seats will be filled by the Government as per the norms of reservations in force

eligibilityCriteria.entranceExam: Candidates must appear for the common entrance examination (POLYCET) conducted by the State Board of Technical Education and Training, Andhra Pradesh, Hyderabad
requirements: Candidates must satisfy the eligibility requirements as per the rules laid down by the authorities
Candidates must meet the academic and age criteria specified by the POLYCET examination

documentsRequired: Transfer Certificate (at the time of admission only)
Caste Certificate (if belongs to SC/ST and BC)
